resources.string: GeoQuiz

Correct!
Incorrect!
Settings
The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
Africa is the second largest continent in the world based on geography and size.
North America is the largest continent in the world based on highest population and largest size.
Spain and Portugal are found on the Iberian Peninsula in Europe.
The three countries with the largest land area in the world are Russia, Canada, and the United States.
The North Pole is not located on a continent.

Cheating is wrong.
